dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4216 IH: Northern Mariana Islands Enhanced Nutrition Assistance Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Sablan introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Agricultural Act of 2014 to make available additional funds for the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands pilot project.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Northern Mariana Islands Enhanced Nutrition Assistance Act of 2017.
Section 4031(e)(2)(A)(ii) of the Agricultural Act of 2014 (Public Law 113â€“79; 48 U.S.C. 1841 note) is amended by striking and 2018 and inserting through 2023.
